/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the scene. The street is flanked by buildings on both sides, their red roofs contrasting with the clear blue sky. The buildings are nestled amidst lush green trees, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. The sun shines brightly in the top left corner of the image, casting shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings.
